product_name: All Terrain Kids' Herbal Armor Insect Repellent Spray - 2 fl. oz.
long_description: Packaged in an easy-to-use spray bottle, the All Terrain Kids' Herbal Armor insect repellent is perfect for families who demand effectiveness but don't want DEET. Unique formula contains 5 natural essential oils recognized by the EPA as repellents. Clinically proven to be 100% effective for more than 2 hrs. and 95.8% effective for 3 hrs. Protects against mosquitoes, ticks, gnats, flies, ants, black flies and other pesky insects. Natural ingredients won't damage or fade fabric or equipment. 2 fl. oz. bottle of All Terrain Kids' Herbal Armor insect repellent packs away easily.
short_description: Packaged in an easy-to-use spray bottle, the All Terrain Kids' Herbal Armor insect repellent is perfect for families who demand effectiveness but don't want DEET.
